3. Compare the pick numbers to check if the QB was picked before the OT. In this case, JP Losman has a lower pick number than Dylan McFarland, meaning he was drafted earlier (or "picked" earlier).

2. Next, I will compare the positions of the players in consecutive rows to determine if they are from the same position or not.
